word:
We are living in a time when the world is represented as in Noah's time, and as in the days of Sodom. I am constantly being shown the great dangers 


                                   - 23 - 

to which youth, and men and women who have just reached manhood and womanhood, and also men and women of mature years, are exposed, and I dare not hold my peace. There is need of greater refinement, both in thought and association. There is need of Christians being more elevated and delicate in words and deportment.
